verses.verse: וַיֵּצֵ֞א <WH3318> came forth הַגּוֹרָ֤ל <WH1486> lot הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <WH8145> And the second לְשִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> to Simeon לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> [even] for the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> according to their families וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become נַֽחֲלָתָ֔ם <WH5159> and their inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> was within נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> had לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like בְּנַֽחֲלָתָ֑ם <WH5159> And they had in their inheritance בְּאֵֽר־ שֶׁ֥בַע <WH884> Beersheba וְשֶׁ֖בַע <WH7652> or Sheba וּמוֹלָדָֽה׃ <WH4137> and Moladah
וַחֲצַ֥ר שׁוּעָ֛ל <WH2705> And Hazarshual וּבָלָ֖ה <WH1088> and Balah וָעָֽצֶם׃ <WH6107> and Azem
וְאֶלְתּוֹלַ֥ד <WH513> And Eltolad וּבְת֖וּל <WH1329> and Bethul וְחָרְמָֽה׃ <WH2767> and Hormah
וְצִֽקְלַ֥ג <WH6860> And Ziklag וּבֵית־ הַמַּרְכָּב֖וֹת <WH1024> and Bethmarcaboth וַחֲצַ֥ר סוּסָֽה׃ <WH2701> and Hazarsusah
וּבֵ֥ית לְבָא֖וֹת <WH1034> And Bethlebaoth וְשָֽׁרוּחֶ֑ן <WH8287> and Sharuhen עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities שְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> three עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> ten וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> and their villages
עַ֥יִן ׀ <WH5871> Ain רִמּ֖וֹן <WH7417> Remmon וָעֶ֣תֶר <WH6281> and Ether וְעָשָׁ֑ן <WH6228> and Ashan עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities אַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> four וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> and their villages

וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַֽחֲצֵרִ֗ים <WH2691> And all the villages אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which סְבִיבוֹת֙ <WH5439> that [were] round about הֶֽעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> these cities הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these עַד־ <WH5704> far בַּֽעֲלַ֥ת בְּאֵ֖ר <WH1192> to Baalathbeer רָ֣אמַת <WH7414> Ramath נֶ֑גֶב <WH5045> of the south זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <WH5159> This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> according to their families

מֵחֶ֙בֶל֙ <WH2256> Out of the portion בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah נַחֲלַ֖ת <WH5159> [was] the inheritance בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children שִׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become חֵ֤לֶק <WH2506> for the part בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah רַ֣ב <WH7227> was too much מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> of Judah's וַיִּנְחֲל֥וּ <WH5159> the inheritance בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> for them therefore the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> within נַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <WH5159> inheritance פ

וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> came up הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <WH1486> lot הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> And the third לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> for the children זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> of Zebulun לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> according to their families וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> become גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> and the border נַחֲלָתָ֖ם <WH5159> of their inheritance עַד־ <WH5704> far שָׂרִֽיד׃ <WH8301> was unto Sarid

וְעָלָ֨ה <WH5927> went up גְבוּלָ֧ם ׀ <WH1366> And their border לַיָּ֛מָּה <WH3220> toward the sea וּמַרְעֲלָ֖ה <WH4831> and Maralah וּפָגַ֣ע <WH6293> and reached בְּדַבָּ֑שֶׁת <WH1708> to Dabbasheth וּפָגַע֙ <WH6293> and reached אֶל־ <WH413> to הַנַּ֔חַל <WH5158> to the river אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [is] before יָקְנְעָֽם׃ <WH3362> Jokneam

וְשָׁ֣ב <WH7725> And turned מִשָּׂרִ֗יד <WH8301> from Sarid קֵ֚דְמָה <WH6924> eastward מִזְרַ֣ח <WH4217> east side הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> east side עַל־ <WH5921> far גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> unto the border כִּסְלֹ֖ת תָּבֹ֑ר <WH3696> of Chislothtabor וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> and then goeth out אֶל־ <WH413> to הַדָּֽבְרַ֖ת <WH1705> to Daberath וְעָלָ֥ה <WH5927> and goeth up יָפִֽיעַ׃ <WH3309> to Japhia

וּמִשָּׁ֤ם <WH8033> there עָבַר֙ <WH5674> And from thence passeth on along קֵ֣דְמָה <WH6924> eastward מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> the sunrise גִּתָּ֥ה חֵ֖פֶר <WH1662> to Gittahhepher עִתָּ֣ה קָצִ֑ין <WH6278> to Ittahkazin וְיָצָ֛א <WH3318> and goeth out רִמּ֥וֹן <WH7417> to Remmonmethoar הַמְּתֹאָ֖ר <WH7417> to Rimmon הַנֵּעָֽה׃ <WH5269> to Neah

וְנָסַ֤ב <WH5437> compasseth אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> הַגְּב֔וּל <WH1366> And the border מִצְּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> it on the north side חַנָּתֹ֑ן <WH2615> to Hannathon וְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become תֹּֽצְאֹתָ֔יו <WH8444> and the outgoings גֵּ֖י <WH1516> thereof are in the valley יִפְתַּח־ אֵֽל׃ <WH3317> of Jiphthahel

וְקַטָּ֤ת <WH7005> And Kattath וְנַֽהֲלָל֙ <WH5096> and Nahallal וְשִׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8110> and Shimron וְיִדְאֲלָ֖ה <WH3030> and Idalah וּבֵ֣ית לָ֑חֶם <WH1035> and Bethlehem עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities שְׁתֵּים־ <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> ten וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> with their villages

זֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> This [is] the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> of Zebulun לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> according to their families הֶֽעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> these cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> with their villages פ

לְיִ֨שָּׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> to Issachar יָצָ֖א <WH3318> came out הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <WH1486> lot הָֽרְבִיעִ֑י <WH7243> [And] the fourth לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> for the children יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> of Issachar לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> according to their families
וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> become גְּבוּלָ֑ם <WH1366> And their border יִזְרְעֶ֥אלָה <WH3157> was toward Jezreel וְהַכְּסוּלֹ֖ת <WH3694> and Chesulloth וְשׁוּנֵֽם׃ <WH7766> and Shunem
וַחֲפָרַ֥יִם <WH2663> And Hapharaim וְשִׁיאֹ֖ן <WH7866> and Shion וַאֲנָחֲרַֽת׃ <WH588> and Anaharath
וְהָֽרַבִּ֥ית <WH7245> And Rabbith וְקִשְׁי֖וֹן <WH7191> and Kishion וָאָֽבֶץ׃ <WH77> and Abez
וְרֶ֧מֶת <WH7432> And Remeth וְעֵין־ גַּנִּ֛ים <WH5873> and Engannim וְעֵ֥ין חַדָּ֖ה <WH5876> and Enhaddah וּבֵ֥ית פַּצֵּֽץ׃ <WH1048> and Bethpazzez

וּפָגַע֩ <WH6293> reacheth הַגְּב֨וּל <WH1366> And the coast בְּתָב֤וֹר <WH8396> to Tabor [וְשַׁחֲצוּמָה כ] (וְשַׁחֲצִ֙ימָה֙ <WH7831> Shahazimah ק) וּבֵ֣ית שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH1053> and Bethshemesh וְהָי֛וּ <WH1961> become תֹּצְא֥וֹת <WH8444> and the outgoings גְּבוּלָ֖ם <WH1366> of their border הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> were at Jordan עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> with their villages

זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <WH5159> This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> of Issachar לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> according to their families הֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> the cities וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> and their villages פ

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> came out הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <WH1486> lot הַֽחֲמִישִׁ֔י <WH2549> And the fifth לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> for the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children אָשֵׁ֖ר <WH836> of Asher לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> according to their families
וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> become גְּבוּלָ֑ם <WH1366> And their border חֶלְקַ֥ת <WH2520> was Helkath וַחֲלִ֖י <WH2482> and Hali וָבֶ֥טֶן <WH991> and Beten וְאַכְשָֽׁף׃ <WH407> and Achshaph

וְאַֽלַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH487> And Alammelech וְעַמְעָ֖ד <WH6008> and Amad וּמִשְׁאָ֑ל <WH4861> and Misheal וּפָגַ֤ע <WH6293> and reacheth בְּכַרְמֶל֙ <WH3760> to Carmel הַיָּ֔מָּה <WH3220> westward וּבְשִׁיח֖וֹר לִבְנָֽת׃ <WH7884> and to Shihorlibnath

וְשָׁ֨ב <WH7725> And turneth מִזְרַ֣ח <WH4217> east side הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ֮ <WH8121> east side בֵּ֣ית דָּגֹן֒ <WH1016> to Bethdagon וּפָגַ֣ע <WH6293> and reacheth בִּ֠זְבֻלוּן <WH2074> to Zebulun וּבְגֵ֨י <WH1516> and to the valley יִפְתַּח־ אֵ֥ל <WH3317> of Jiphthahel צָפ֛וֹנָה <WH6828> toward the north side בֵּ֥ית הָעֵ֖מֶק <WH1025> of Bethemek וּנְעִיאֵ֑ל <WH5272> and Neiel וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> and goeth out אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּב֖וּל <WH3521> to Cabul מִשְּׂמֹֽאל׃ <WH8040> on the left hand
וְעֶבְרֹ֥ן <WH5683> And Hebron וּרְחֹ֖ב <WH7340> and Rehob וְחַמּ֣וֹן <WH2540> and Hammon וְקָנָ֑ה <WH7071> and Kanah עַ֖ד <WH5704> far צִיד֥וֹן <WH6721> Zidon רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7227> [even] unto great

וְשָׁ֤ב <WH7725> turneth הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> And [then] the coast הָֽרָמָ֔ה <WH7414> to Ramah וְעַד־ <WH5704> against עִ֖יר <WH5892> city מִבְצַר־ <WH4013> and to the strong צֹ֑ר <WH6865> Tyre וְשָׁ֤ב <WH7725> turneth הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> and the coast חֹסָ֔ה <WH2621> to Hosah [וְיִהְיוּ כ] (וְהָי֧וּ <WH1961> become ק) תֹצְאֹתָ֛יו <WH8444> and the outgoings הַיָּ֖מָּה <WH3220> thereof are at the sea מֵחֶ֥בֶל <WH2256> from the coast אַכְזִֽיבָה׃ <WH392> to Achzib

וְעֻמָ֥ה <WH5981> Ummah וַאֲפֵ֖ק <WH663> also and Aphek וּרְחֹ֑ב <WH7340> and Rehob עָרִ֛ים <WH5892> cities עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <WH8147> and two וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> with their villages

זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <WH5159> This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children אָשֵׁ֖ר <WH836> of Asher לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> according to their families הֶעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> these cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> with their villages פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> to the children נַפְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> of Naphtali יָצָ֖א <WH3318> came out הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <WH1486> lot הַשִּׁשִּׁ֑י <WH8345> The sixth לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> [even] for the children נַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> of Naphtali לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> according to their families

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become גְבוּלָ֗ם <WH1366> And their coast מֵחֵ֨לֶף <WH2501> was from Heleph מֵֽאֵל֜וֹן <WH438> from Allon בְּצַעֲנַנִּ֗ים <WH6815> to Zaanannim וַאֲדָמִ֥י <WH129> and Adami הַנֶּ֛קֶב <WH5346> Nekeb וְיַבְנְאֵ֖ל <WH2995> and Jabneel עַד־ <WH5704> far לַקּ֑וּם <WH3946> unto Lakum וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> and the outgoings הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> thereof were at Jordan

וְשָׁ֨ב <WH7725> turneth הַגְּב֥וּל <WH1366> And [then] the coast יָ֙מָּה֙ <WH3220> westward אַזְנ֣וֹת תָּב֔וֹר <WH243> to Aznothtabor וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> and goeth out מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there חוּקֹ֑קָה <WH2712> from thence to Hukkok וּפָגַ֨ע <WH6293> and reacheth בִּזְבֻל֜וּן <WH2074> to Zebulun מִנֶּ֗גֶב <WH5045> on the south side וּבְאָשֵׁר֙ <WH836> to Asher פָּגַ֣ע <WH6293> and reacheth מִיָּ֔ם <WH3220> on the west side וּבִ֣יהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and to Judah הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> upon Jordan מִזְרַ֥ח <WH4217> east side הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> east side

וְעָרֵ֖י <WH5892> cities מִבְצָ֑ר <WH4013> And the fenced הַצִּדִּ֣ים <WH6661> [are] Ziddim צֵ֔ר <WH6863> Zer וְחַמַּ֖ת <WH2575> and Hammath רַקַּ֥ת <WH7557> Rakkath וְכִנָּֽרֶת׃ <WH3672> and Chinnereth
וַאֲדָמָ֥ה <WH128> And Adamah וְהָרָמָ֖ה <WH7414> and Ramah וְחָצֽוֹר׃ <WH2674> and Hazor
וְקֶ֥דֶשׁ <WH6943> And Kedesh וְאֶדְרֶ֖עִי <WH154> and Edrei וְעֵ֥ין חָצֽוֹר׃ <WH5877> and Enhazor

וְיִרְאוֹן֙ <WH3375> And Iron וּמִגְדַּל־ אֵ֔ל <WH4027> and Migdalel חֳרֵ֥ם <WH2765> Horem וּבֵית־ עֲנָ֖ת <WH1043> and Bethanath וּבֵ֣ית שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH1053> and Bethshemesh עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities תְּשַֽׁע־ <WH8672> nine עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> with their villages

זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <WH5159> This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children נַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> of Naphtali לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> according to their families הֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> the cities וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> and their villages פ

לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> for the tribe בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children דָ֖ן <WH1835> of Dan לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> according to their families יָצָ֖א <WH3318> came out הַגּוֹרָ֥ל <WH1486> lot הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7637> [And] the seventh
